backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with access control, user profiles, game logic, payment structures, and maps for users, transactions, coupons, and configuration.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing wheel UI fixes, pointer animation changes, and related affected files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short textual summaries of various frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base/theme variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routing, authentication handling, layout, and admin-protected routes for the React app.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentSet: Admin UI for configuring Stripe payments with validation, status display, and async submission.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking admin status and redirecting unauthorized users with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial profile setup with form fields, validation, and referral handling.
frontend/src/components/common/PageHeade: Reusable page header displaying a title, optional description, badge, and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/common/PremiumSp: Animated premium-style spinner component with configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/game/OutcomeEffe: Shows animated visual effects based on game outcome and hides them after a timed duration.
frontend/src/components/game/SpinWheel.t: Spinning wheel component that animates deterministically to land on a given outcome and triggers a callback when done.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, user data, mobile menu, and animated background.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BalanceTi: Animated counter that smoothly updates the displayed credit balance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for profile, admin status, leaderboard, credit data, spinning the wheel, and profile setup, all tied to an actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, dark theme OKLCH color variables, base styles, and custom utility classes including animations and premium UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides admin navigation cards for managing users, wheel config, withdrawals, and payment requests.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManualPaym: Allows admins to view, approve, decline manual payment requests and configure QR/instruction settings.
Displays leaderboard users for admins with ability to edit and update user credit balances.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWheelConfi: Shows and updates the house edge configuration for the wheel game, including validation and saving.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Placeholder admin page for managing withdrawal requests, currently showing no pending items.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Implements a UI for purchasing credits, creating manual payment requests, viewing request statuses, and displaying payment configuration.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Implements the spin‑wheel game page, handling spins, outcomes, balance updates, and visual effects with profile-dependent behavior.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with Internet Identity authentication and premium-styled UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Shows a failure message when a payment request is not created and provides retry or return options.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Displays the status of a submitted manual payment request and refreshes related user data.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the user's profile info including name, DOB, balance, and badges with loading states and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Shows a full transaction history with icons, amounts, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/UnauthorizedPage.tsx: Renders an access denied message with navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Displays current balance, buy/withdraw actions, and a list of recent transactions.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Shows withdrawal info and alerts that withdrawals are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Builds full asset URLs using the app’s base path while handling slashes safely.
frontend/src/utils/creditPricing.ts: Provides helpers to derive credits-per-INR ratios, compute credits from INR, and validate package availability.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats INR values and converts between rupees and paise.
frontend/src/utils/generatedAssets.ts: Lists static paths for pre-generated wheel and effect assets used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with session fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling class-based dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project state describing wheel UI issues, required fixes, and pending feature requests for label centering and pointer alignment, styling, and animation.
